rooms.description: An open-plan entry space that adheres to Scandinavian design with clean lines, ample natural light, and minimalistic decor. The space integrates Vastu principles by aligning the entrance in a north-east direction.

A spacious living area with a Scandinavian aesthetic featuring neutral tones and functional furniture. Large windows ensure abundant natural light, following Vastu guidelines for energy flow. The layout supports both relaxation and social gatherings.
An open dining space integrated within the living area. Minimalist design with emphasis on simplicity and functionality, aligning seating arrangements in a north-east direction for prosperity.

A modern Scandinavian kitchen designed for efficiency. Stainless steel appliances, open storage systems, and ample counter space enhance the culinary experience while incorporating Vastu principles by placing the cooking area in the south-west.

A multifunctional studio bedroom that doubles as a workspace. The design incorporates light, airy interiors with Scandinavian minimalism and ensures proper alignment of the bed in an east direction for positive energy flow according to Vastu.

A compact yet modern bathroom designed with clean lines. The layout considers both functionality and aesthetics, incorporating Vastu principles by placing fixtures in the north-east for optimal water flow.

openings.description: Main entrance door positioned on the north-east to align with Vastu principles and Scandinavian design emphasis on natural light.
Large window in the kitchen area designed for ample lighting, ensuring energy-efficient thermal comfort while following local building norms.

rooms.description: A landscaped rooftop terrace designed for relaxation and social gatherings. The terrace incorporates Scandinavian design with minimalist furniture, greenery, and water features, ensuring an open layout that respects local building norms and Vastu principles.

openings.description: A secure and functional access point to the rooftop terrace, designed with safety and convenience in mind while adhering to local building codes.
